verses.name: Luke 19:6
verses.text: And he made haste, and came down, and received him joyfully.

verses.name: Luke 19:7
verses.text: And when they saw it, they all murmured, saying, That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner.

verses.name: Luke 19:8
verses.text: And Zaccheus stood, and said unto the Lord; Behold, Lord, the half of my goods I give to the poor; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation, I restore him fourfold.

verses.name: Luke 19:9
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, This day is salvation come to this house, forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham.
